nodes.text: Ib Dekeet was an Imperial governor who was stationed in the Outer Rim Territories.

Dekeet was one of the five powerful representatives present at the Pentastar Talks, and was initially hesitant to join forces with Grand Moff Ardus Kaine. However, the Grand Moff's skills as an orator and negotiator won the governor over. In particular, Governor Dekeet objected to putting the Pentastar logo on vehicles and troops under their command. Ardus Kaine pushed back on this by pointing out that the badge would strike fear and command respect within the heart of the Pentastar Alignment's enemies.
